Great place, great ambiance, good food and nice wines! This is one of my all time favourite places in the city and it always meet my expectations. Upstairs at Boca Chica, they always serve nice cocktails and the atmosphere is amazing. The bartenders are very skilled and in general, the staff at both Boca Grande and Chica are very nice and professional. Also, it's a must to visit the bathrooms in the basement!
